GSD.description:
LSM: general protection fault in legacy_parse_param

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 2784604c8c6fc523248f8f80a421c313a9d790b7. For more details please see the references link.
